text: Despite an imminent government shutdown, it took only two words for Kanye and Kim Kardashian West to break into the news cycle Friday. As they do. This time, it was with “ Chicago West, ” the announcement of the name of their third child, a baby girl born by surrogacy Jan. 15. She joined older siblings North West and Saint West, whose names also received their fair share of scrutiny after they were bequeathed. Kim tweeted the name Friday afternoon — and the jokes came immediately : Chicago West sounded like the name of a hospital. Would the child ’ s nickname be “ Windy ”? Would she always be cold? Kim Kardashian, one person argued, had just out - Kim Kardashianed herself. Kim and Kanye named their baby Chicago
